item.title: About Myself
item.description: Shortly about myself I am a third year student in a Bachelor of Engineering programme in Information Technology. My strengths include Web Development,and teamwork, because I have been involved in multiple group projects. As an employee, im excited to try out new things. I’m not afraid of failure, because nobody is perfect. And in the future I will see myself as A IT-employee excited from technology. I have also expressed interest in linux-server maintenance, and I have enjoyed maintaining and configuring my own linux server.
item.content:
Shortly about myself

I am a third year student in a Bachelor of Engineering programme in Information Technology. My strengths include Web Development,and teamwork, because I have been involved in multiple group projects. As an employee, im excited to try out new things. I’m not afraid of failure, because nobody is perfect. And in the future I will see myself as A IT-employee excited from technology. I have also expressed interest in linux-server maintenance, and I have enjoyed maintaining and configuring my own linux server.

Work Experience

2019/04 - 2020/01, City Of Turku, Project Employee in the Digipore-project

My responsibilities were the mobile-layout of the service we built, accessibility, analytics, and search engine optimization. For code technologies, technologies used included: React, Redux, sass and bootstrap. Besides the technologies, this project taught me working as a group, coordination between team members, and meeting practices.

2016/08 - 2016/10, Turun Ekotori, Electronic equipment repairman/tester, and customer service agent.

The required maintance, repairing, testing, and preparing for sale of various electrical appliances, and customer servcice, regarding their questions to certain electric appliances. I was responsible also for the information security of the repaired devices, and the stations used by the workers, their standardization, and the setting up, and maintenance of the repair shops own printing-, and web-services.

2015/01 - 2015/03, Sekä 10/2015 - 12/2015 Kansalaisen mikrotuki (Nyk. Kansalaisen IT-Tuki), IT-Tukihenkilö

On-the job learning, that i did during my Vocational Qualification in Information and Communications Technology. During these perioids i learned to do customer service over the counter, and on the phone. My main responsibilities were Laptop & Mobile diagnostic-, repair-, installation-, and maintenance-jobs, operating system installs / upgrades, and their information security.

Education

2021 - … Oulu University of Applied Sciences, Information Technology, Engineer, Software Development.

2014 - 2017, Novida Lieto Campus, Vocational Qualification in Business Information Technology.

  • The IT-parts of this degree included Working in support related tasks, Setting up systems, maintaining them, supervising them, support related to said systems, and information security upkeeping. As my degree work, i made a route, route-point, and a user management system on a linux based envivorment with PHP and MySQL.

Other Notable Achievements

2022-2023 Working as a representative of informations for the student organization OIO Ry
